results.title: Metformin Alleviates Autistic-Like Behaviors Elicited by High-Fat Diet Consumption and Modulates the Crosstalk Between Serotonin and Gut Microbiota in Mice
results.text_hl: HFD-fed @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ showed a marked aggravation of @<m>DISEASE_Mental_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001523 @@@repetitive behaviors@@@ (marble burying and self-grooming), and this was prevented by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ administration.

results.title: The effects of endurance exercise and metformin on memory impairment caused by diabetes.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: The results of the present study revealed both HIIT and MICT exercises had protective effects against oxidative stress and @<m>DISEASE_Mental_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001523 @@@behavioral impairments@@@ induced by @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ and these effects were comparable to the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.
